actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide that the counties of Fremont and Page shall be in the Western Division of the Southern Judicial District of Iowa.

summary.text: Transfers the counties of Fremont and Page from the Southern Division to the Western Division of the Southern Judicial District of Iowa.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide that the counties of Fremont and Page shall be in the Western Division of the Southern Judicial District of Iowa.
